tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NN @TheBodyShopUK) (NN A)) (NP (JJ nice) (JJ hot) (NN bath))) (VP (VBZ brings) (NP (PRP me))) (. .)))

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP It)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS simples) (NNS things)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBP are) (NP (DT the) (JJS best))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [things/NNS nsubj>It/PRP cop>is/VBZ det>the/DT compound>simples/NNS acl:relcl>[best/JJS nsubj>that/WDT cop>are/VBP det>the/DT] punct>!/.]
